title: Has anyone read the book '*Zen as F**ck'? My therapists suggested it. What do those who suffer from depression and anxiety do to cope on a daily basis? - Quora

response.answer_text: For the first question, I would say you should read the reviews for the book to find out if it’s something you would like to read. Here is a link to the book’s Goodreads page. It is rated 4.44, which is very high. Zen as F*ck As for your second question, your therapist should have provided you with coping skills. If he/she hasn’t yet, you should talk to them about it in your next session. Here is a list of coping skills that my own therapist printed out and gave to me:
